ConfigFramework.Doc: This model simulates population settlement growth in the Chainjing Region of China using Cell-Devs. The original research is done here: https://dash.harvard.edu/handle/1/33747421. It uses Lopez linux version with multiple state variables (value) with related initial value defined in *.stvalues. Drawlog file shows 2D visualization of simulation result logs. For Detailed XML configuration please see User Manual.
